Using your trig and co function identities to evaluate

\begin{array}{l}\n\sin 30^{\circ}=\frac{1}{2}, \tan 30^{\circ}=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3} \\\n\csc \left(30^{\circ}\right)= \\\n\cos \left(30^{\circ}\right)= \\\n\cot \left(60^{\circ}\right)= \\\n\cot \left(30^{\circ}\right)=\n\end{array}[imath]\sin 30^{\circ}=\frac{1}{2}, \tan 30^{\circ}=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3} [/imath] [imath]\csc \left(30^{\circ}\right)= [/imath] [imath]\cos \left(30^{\circ}\right)= [/imath] [imath]\cot \left(60^{\circ}\right)= [/imath] [imath]\cot \left(30^{\circ}\right)=[/imath]
